website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a tried-and-true product for a decent price, Dark and Lovely is the relaxer to choose. It has earned a loyal customer base for the reliable results it produces.
pros: A trusted product that's been popular for decades
Repeat customers rave about the results, and that it doesn't cause a stinging or burning sensation on the scalp when directions are followed closely
cons: May leave hair feeling a bit dry
Some customers received the wrong product

customer_reviews.title: Perfect relaxer!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this relaxer comes with six different things to condition and moisturize your hair. I hadn't relaxed my hair in 6 months. When I finally did, this relaxer left my thick coarse hair shiny, straight, sleek and very manageable. **For the record there is nothing wrong with natural hair, but I liked the results of this product**
customer_reviews.author: NichelleChelsey

customer_reviews.title: It works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. Read the dang instructions on it before you complain about it not working or burning your skin or whatever. Too many people leaving bad reviews simply because they didn't read. The thing works. Its a chemical so it will burn you if you don't use it properly. Peace out
customer_reviews.author: Koru

customer_reviews.title: Gentle
customer_reviews.text: I Have being using this product for years. Love the way it makes my hair look and feel with having permanent color. There are not many products on the market that you can use with permanent hair color. In my opinion this is one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: alinder

customer_reviews.title: Straight as an arrow
customer_reviews.text: The last relaxer I used hardly straighten my hair. I had to deal with uncooperative hair for an entire month waiting for the new growth to come. I went back to an old favorite with the dark and lovely and had great results! Will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind Brazel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the reviews there are so many bad ones but since my hair is already half gone because i got off birth control I decided oh well let me try it . I thought I would burn or be bald but it turns out this was such an amazing product didn’t burn at all , no hair came out my hair feels amazing and I’m on my journey to growing my hair back so take a leap of faith just like me
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: I put this perm in my hair, which i thought was fine bc i have used it b4 but this time it took me forever to wash it out...i couldn't get it out after several washes i had to take some of my suave shampoo and use it just to get it out...i believe the product itself was old...so that's why i say never again...will i buy something bc of a cheap price it is not worth it...
customer_reviews.author: Torri H

customer_reviews.title: Product came damaged. Do not buy, y’all!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I can rate lower than a star. Package came destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Really Love the Results
customer_reviews.text: I am a 51 Latino male with thick, coarse, and wavy hair. Due to quartine, my hair has grown out when I usually keep short crew. I used this product and spent about 50-65 minutes doing all 6 steps, ensuring all the product was washed out before moving on to the next step. My hair is soft, smooth/straight, easier to manage. I did not have any hair fall out like other reviews. Easy of use is 4-star because you do have to set aside time.
customer_reviews.author: RoS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works wonders! will buy again in the future. Update- i have horribly coarse hair, so this item is a must. I use this to help control it from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Keri R.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair strong and straight but not stringy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this more than once on here and got the same results. It has a quite a few steps, but using all of the products that come with it really does help to give a long lasting relaxed look. It's worth taking the few extra minutes. This relaxer left my hair feeling strong with some body and shine to it. It lasted longer than my usual relaxer kits. There's a visible difference between using this and other relaxers.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: They have the newer version. It eliminated the little #3 👉Keratin, and replaced it with a fiber Strength post treatment. I loved the final results of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Happy.

customer_reviews.title: The Best I’ve Tried
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the ORS Olive Oil relaxer in regular, but it just wasn’t giving me the straighten I wanted, so I decided to try a super but I wanted something that wasn’t going to be damaging and I found this! It worked AMAZING my hair is so straight and I hard hardly any shedding compared to when using the ORS one. I definitely think this will become my new go to, and for $6 it’s cheaper than all others I’ve used. I 100% RECCOMEND
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: silky soft touch !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my husband so i can lay down his hair , he is mixed and his hair is so lusciously curly he finally told me he is ready for me to make it straight so he suggested I buy this product. I have used other products like this one before but I have never used this brand inparticulary , but I'm excited to do his hair again and see how it comes out. I have tons of experience and I have so much fun each time I get to do hair its feel a sparkle in the sky you get so excited each time you see that sparkle.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing DIY home relaxer
customer_reviews.text: Remarkable results. Way step up from older DIY home relaxers. Hair so soft shiny very manageable. Great alternative to salon care since Corona invaded our lives. Will most definitely use again. even after this mess is over. Thanks D&L
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Whoever packaged this was a clown and you know it . J@ckass
customer_reviews.author: Rayann

customer_reviews.title: Irritation free for me!
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my VERY OVER GROWN HAIR! This was great on my scalp as far as irritant free for me. No tax-laxing needed. Just be sure to read and do as the directions say. I hope you will be as pleased as I am!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia O.

customer_reviews.title: Good for use on Human Hair Wig
customer_reviews.text: I used it on a human hair bob that was old and this helped to restore it back to its original shine and luster. Make sure you follow the instructions and use all of the products in order as suggested. I would purchase again for future wigs.
customer_reviews.author: Cocoa

customer_reviews.title: Dead Straight
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is no joke and I’ve straightened my hair for years. Just know to be safe on the skin and respect the time. Works great but will burn of left on to long as any straightener will.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Why is is so thick
customer_reviews.text: Arrived busted open I still used it but .disappointed Only issue is the relaxer was so thick and hard to work with next time I'll buy from somewhere else maybe that's why it's cheap. Seller does care about customers they just throw it in the shipping box busted open
customer_reviews.author: exotic

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buying again
customer_reviews.text: Now I don’t usually use Dark and lovely, but Thai my first time. I used it and it lasted for three weeks even with me getting in shower and steam my hair still wasn’t thick and it was straight. I have short hair and it got it straight to the point where I could do finger waves. The product inside is great for the price.

Despite all of that, I am sad because, when I try to buy again, shipping was refused to my country. I hope they will consider it again

Thank goodness I only left it on for 5 mins. or I wouldn't have any hair! What was burnt, I cut off, but even after washing over and over, 3 weeks later, the burnt smell was still in my hair. BAD!

customer_reviews.title: Dark and Lovely for colored hair

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. Took all of my hair out!
customer_reviews.text: I've used relaxers before and I thought this one would be ok. It was not, it took all of my hair out in patches. Fried my ends and damaged my great, strong healthy hair. Please, please, please do not buy/use this product. All of my hair is down the drain, the hair I have left on my head is fried and my ends are hard and it looks horrible. AVOID!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bigmama Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hair relaxer!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this relaxer for about a year now. It's helped my hair to grow out quite a bit. But it's to find it and also for the reasonable price you get it on Amazon. Highly recommend! Update: 30 August 2017- I ordered more of this product. It's excellent! I do my own perms. Easy to follow directions. I'm getting better at it now and my hair looks good. I love this product and will continue to buy it. I hope Amazon keeps selling it. Good price too! One kit lasts 2 times to do your hair.

customer_reviews.title: Complicated for weak results.
customer_reviews.text: Way too complicated for what it is. Compared to ORS Olive Oil or old school TCB (new one is crap too) the results are weak. So many steps and waiting times.

product_meta.title: SoftSheen-Carson Dark and Lovely Healthy-Gloss 5 Shea Moisture No-Lye Relaxer - Super
product_meta.description: Size:1 Count| Style:Relaxer - SuperExperience our next generation in healthy relaxing. Our components are exclusively formulated to preserve the 5 signs of healthy hair and more while you relax. • For coarse hair • Provides softness and body • Gives hair moisture, shine and strength • We believe in beauty without compromise Always read all product labeling and instructions completely prior to use. READ AND FOLLOW ENCLOSED INSTRUCTION SHEET BEFORE USING. FAILURE TO FOLLOW INSTRUCTIONS OR WARNINGS OR OTHER MISUSE OF THE PRODUCT CAN CAUSE INJURY TO EYES OR SKIN AND CAN DAMAGE HAIR OR RESULT IN PERMANENT HAIR LOSS.
feature_bullets: SHEA MOISTURE NO-LYE RELAXER: The next generation in hair relaxing, this Relaxer kit helps preserve the 5 signs of healthy hair: Moisture, Shine, Strength, Softness & Body. Perfect for coarse hair.

STRAIGHT, SLEEK & SHINY HAIR: Now featuring 3 new components including Healthy-Gloss 5 Moisture Conditioner, Healthy-Gloss 5 Moisture Hair Crème & our exclusive Silk Keratin Serum for softness & body.
UNIQUE LOOKS: We help people of color celebrate unique looks & styles with an array of treatments, colors & styling products for all hair types: curly, wavy, natural, relaxed, transitioning & more.
SOFTSHEEN-CARSON: For over 110 years we have provided beauty to all consumers of African descent with our innovative, tailor-made, superior products & services specially designed for their needs.

RELAX AT HOME: Our Dark and Lovely Triple Nourished Relaxer system has you covered if you missed your appointment. Our relaxer kit will help you maintain your sleek and smooth look at home, with shea butter, jojoba and avocado oil.
RELAX AT HOME: This at-home no-lye relaxer kit is available in Normal and Super strength, depending on hair type. Easy to use, follow instruction sheet for optimal results.
